sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To 7 ft. hard wood dhd som time since 400
To two loads pine wood 225x pr l.
To rent of carpenter shop from
To use of waggon for teacher -
By the expence of her package to
To cash when going to Worcester
